name: Blitz Football Manager 2023
description:
BECOME A TOP TIER AMERICAN FOOTBALL MANAGER!
Become the GM of a world class American Football Franchise in Blitz Football Manager! Build an end zone ready team with a mix of newly drafted youth and established league legends! Apply your Playbook and you'll be ready to take your franchise to the top!

Download the game today to get your free Starter Pack!

FEATURES

COMPETITIVE TOURNAMENTS AND LEAGUE GAMES
Bring the heat onto the gridiron! Face Off vs other GMs in daily tournaments and daily league games!

DRAFT, TRADE AND UNWRAP NEW PLAYERS
Build your franchise by scouting and drafting youth talent as well as trading for seasoned stars! If they don't give you top performances, send them to the transfer list! Looking for an up and coming Quarterback? Check out the awesome player pack offers in the Blitz store!

MANAGE THE PLAYBOOK
Manage all tactical aspects of the game! In Blitz Football Manager, you are in complete control of the plays and tactics of your team!

DEVELOP YOUR TEAM
Complete full team workout sessions and individual specialist skills training to make your team ready for the upcoming battles. Analyze player traits and abilities to unlock even more potential and special abilities!

OPTIMIZE YOUR DEPTH CHART
Set your team up for wins by leveraging the right personnel! Great football players not only perform in the heat of action, but also last throughout the season!

BUILD A HOME FIELD FOR THE AGES
Build a parking lot made for tailgates, stack up the VIP-area, and add those extra seats! Do whatever it takes to keep those fans happy & ready to cheer home the next big win!

GET REWARDED
The Season Pass gives you increasingly good coaching rewards throughout the season! The bigger the wins, the mightier the rewards! All managers also receive daily free sponsorship packs, as well as many more types of rewards.

OUR COMMUNITY SUPPORT
We are always ready to listen to your input, and we want to include you as much as possible. No matter what your feedback is, you never know, your idea might make it into the game!
